faqs.question: What is the typical price range for a 2BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 67A Gurugram
faqs.answer: The pricing for a 2BHK flat in Sector 67A varies significantly based on the builder, the exact size of the unit, the floor level, and the specific amenities provided within the society. Generally, premium 2BHK units here start from approximately ₹1.35 Crores and can go up to ₹2.10 Crores or more for super-luxury configurations in prominent projects. It is essential to factor in additional costs like stamp duty, registration fees, and EDC IDC charges when calculating the final acquisition cost. We provide detailed, transparent pricing breakdowns upon request.

faqs.question: Are the 2BHK projects in Sector 67A RERA registered and legally compliant
faqs.answer: Yes, nearly all reputable ongoing and recently completed residential projects in Sector 67A are registered under the Haryana Real Estate Regulatory Authority RERA. We strictly list only RERA-compliant properties, ensuring that all legal documentation, construction timelines, and area measurements are verified and protected by regulatory oversight. Buyers should always verify the RERA registration number of the specific project before finalizing any purchase agreement to ensure maximum legal security.

faqs.question: What are the common maintenance charges for a 2BHK flat in this sector
faqs.answer: Maintenance charges in Sector 67A are typically calculated based on the super built-up area of the flat and the quality of amenities offered. For a 2BHK unit, these charges usually range between ₹4.5 to ₹6.5 per square foot per month. This cost generally covers common area electricity, lift maintenance, security services, garbage disposal, clubhouse upkeep, and essential repair work. Some societies may have a separate charge for power backup and dedicated water supply.
